time{time: T} :-
  range{from: 1, to: 10, val: T}.
levelInit{time: 1, val: 1}.
levelStep{time: T, val: V} :-
  time{time: T} &
  T = PrevT + 1 &
  level{time: PrevT, val: PrevV} &
  V = PrevV + 1.
level{time: T, val: V} :-
  levelInit{time: T, val: V} |
  levelStep{time: T, val: V}.
level{}?
----
application/datalog
level{time: 1, val: 1}.
level{time: 10, val: 10}.
